resources.string: We are a "Not for Profit" trust venture building Wellness on wheels(The Tann Mann Gaadi) to address the serious problem of open defecation which is a major health risk for all in developing countries. We are in the mission of integrating technology with our social cause. We are in the process of providing a holistic approach to social responsibility keeping health, sensitization, safety and Eco-friendly solutions

string.name: why
string.br: Open defecation which is a major health risk globally
Inaccessibility of Hygienic and Safe public conveniences
Un-safe environment for women, children, differently abled and the elderly
Lack of potable and clean water
Un-availability of basic health facilities and amenities

resources.string: Click the link here to register

string.name: Talk
string.b: We believe that no contribution is small and each one of us has the ability to give back to the community in some measure. You have the ability to be part of "The Change"
